entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
